name: submitter
description: submits Bitcoin block headers to the BtcMirror contract

while true; do ETH_RPC_URL=https://opt-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/UIWZJo9n_JabdfySOspT_ZwZfExy8UUs BTCMIRROR_CONTRACT_ADDR=0x69ee459ca98cbdecf9156b041ee1621513aef0c6 npm start; echo '

SLEEPING FOR 60s...

SLEEPING...

' && sleep 1; done
